bibl.title: Telegram from Wickliffe Rose to Henry Rose Carter, February 16, 1921

div1.p: Rose requests information on the yellow fever situation. He offers his assistance.

div1.head: Telegram from Wickliffe Rose to Henry Rose Carter, February 16, 1921
div1.opener:
CENTRAL
AND SOUTH AMERICAN
TELEGRAPH CO.
COMUNICACIÓN CON LOS
ESTADOS UNIDOS, CANADA, EUROPA
Y
TODOS PARTES DEL MUNDO.
JAMES A. SCRYMSER, FUNDADOR
11 AM. serves
ALL AMERICA CABLES
L>B.5
FECHA DE RECEPCIÓN
ALL AMERICA CABLES.
INC.
LIMA
Le Adrisand
FEB 16 1921
JOHN L. MERRELL PRESIDENTE
div1.p:
CARTER AMERICAN CONSULATE LIMA
SHOULD WELCOME INFORMATION CONCERNING YELLOW FEVER SITUATION.
ARE YOU REMAINING WITH II its IS FAURTHER ASSISTANCE NEEDED? CABLE
INTERCOM OUR EXPENSE.
div1.closer:
ROSE Pedo intamacion de la fiebreAm situacion
9 PM B
de la fiche amarilla? Qeda eld cun ella? ? Se ne-
cerita mas ayudo? Cable a Nuestros gostos
